gw.api.policy.refresh

Class PolicyExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.policy.refresh.PolicyExtractor

  • public class PolicyExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for extracting a policy graph from an existing Claim/Policy.
    Author:
    bspies

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PolicyExtractor(Graph<IEntityType> pcPolicyGraph)
      Creates a PolicyExtractor that uses the defined type graph to build the policy instance graph.
      PolicyExtractor(java.util.Set<KeyableBean> policyOnlyBeans)
      Creates a PolicyExtractor that uses the given policy-only beans to build the policy instance graph.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Graph<KeyableBean> getPolicyGraph(Policy policy)
      Returns the created policy instance graph.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PolicyExtractor

        public PolicyExtractor(Graph<IEntityType> pcPolicyGraph)
        Creates a PolicyExtractor that uses the defined type graph to build the policy instance graph.
        Parameters:
        pcPolicyGraph - The policy graph (for CC-PC integration)

      • PolicyExtractor

        public PolicyExtractor(java.util.Set<KeyableBean> policyOnlyBeans)
        Creates a PolicyExtractor that uses the given policy-only beans to build the policy instance graph. The collection passed as an argument should reflect all beans that would have been returned from the policy search.
        Parameters:
        policyOnlyBeans - The policy-only beans
        See Also:
        IPolicySearchAdapter

    • Method Detail

      • getPolicyGraph

        public Graph<KeyableBean> getPolicyGraph(Policy policy)
        Returns the created policy instance graph. Must be called after traversal.
        Parameters:
        policy - The policy
        Returns:
        The policy instance graph
